title: The Week of Counsel: Ivan Phillips' Unexpected Journey
summary: Ivan Phillips, a 51-year old counselor, discovers his superpowers through a week of helping others, leading to a battle against crime in his community.
summaryGerman: Ivan Phillips, ein 51-jähriger Berater, entdeckt seine Superkräfte während einer Woche der Hilfe für andere, was zu einem Kampf gegen das Verbrechen in seiner Gemeinde führt.
summaryDutch: Ivan Phillips, een 51-jarige counselor, ontdekt zijn superkrachten tijdens een week van anderen helpen, leidend tot een strijd tegen criminaliteit in zijn gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Ivan Phillips, un conseiller de 51 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs au cours d'une semaine d'aide aux autres, menant à une lutte contre le crime dans sa communauté.

story.text: Ivan Phillips begins his week feeling ordinary, unaware that his innate ability to empathize will soon evolve into mind-reading powers. As he counsels a troubled youth, he accidentally reads the boy's thoughts and helps him confront deep fears.

Ivan realizes his new abilities when he hears thoughts from people passing by on the street. Overwhelmed and intrigued, he seeks solitude to understand this unexpected gift, which is both a blessing and a burden.

Feeling more in control, Ivan uses his powers to better connect with his mentees, resolving conflicts and providing deep insights. His reputation as a counselor grows, as does his understanding of his new powers.

Ivan successfully helps solve a local mystery involving stolen property. His ability to read the culprit's mind leads to a peaceful resolution and recovery of the stolen items, making him a local hero.

In a surprising twist, Ivan's newfound sensitivity brings him closer to a fellow volunteer, Anna. They share a heartfelt conversation about life, love, and the responsibilities that come with great power.

News of Ivan's deeds spread throughout the community. Inspired by Ivan's courage and wisdom, residents start a neighborhood watch program, asking him to lead. Ivan vows to protect and mentor others, using his powers for good.
Reflecting on a week full of unexpected events and personal growth, Ivan spends a quiet day with Anna. They discuss plans for the future and the impact they hope to make together.

ending: And so, Ivan Phillips became not just a counselor, but a guardian of his community, proving that every person has the potential to be a hero.
moral: Great power arises from the desire to help others, transforming everyday moments into extraordinary impacts.
